constructionwand.option.mode.default.des: Extend your building on the side facing you
constructionwand.option.mode.angel.desc: Place behind blocks and in mid air
Extend §aleft/right§f from the original block. No building on top/bottom face
constructionwand.option.lock.vertical.de: Extend §aup/down§f from the original block. No building on top/bottom face
Extend §anorth/south§f on top of the original block. No building on side faces
constructionwand.option.lock.eastwest.de: Extend §aeast/west§f on top of the original block. No building on side faces
constructionwand.option.lock.nolock.desc: Extend from any side of the original block
constructionwand.option.direction.target: Place blocks with same direction as target block
constructionwand.option.replace.yes.desc: Replace certain blocks like fluids, snow and tallgrass
constructionwand.option.match.exact.desc: Only extend blocks that are exactly the same
constructionwand.option.random.yes.desc: Place random blocks present in your hotbar
